title: NTA NEET UG 2024 Supreme Court Hearing Live Updates: No re-test, says Supreme Court | Education News - The Indian Express
selftext: NTA NEET UG 2024 Supreme Court Hearing Live: The Supreme Court today commenced hearing on a batch of petitions related to the controversy-ridden medical entrance exam, NEET-UG 2024. Meanwhile, IIT-Delhi's report stated option 4 is the correct answer for the physics question.
comments:
I followed the entire hearing(since I am a NEET UG aspirant). I and infact most of us knew that  the chances of retest are very low.

What hurt the most was that NTA was not held accountable for all its misconduct and mismanagement.

We were hoping that the agency would be dissolved or at least the apex court would order the Government for some serious changes in the organisation but nothing of that sort happened. That is what hurts the most.
Yeah this has surprised me too honestly. The loopholes in the whole NTA system needed to be addressed. Especially for how they give private tenders for management.
